author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as nine passengers travelling in a public transport bus were severely injured when a lorry rammed the rear of the bus near Udumalpet on Tuesday.

The bus from Kallipalayam was proceeding to Udumalpet. The injured were taken to taluk government hospital at Udumalpet and later referred to Coimbatore for advanced medical care.

Police sources said the incident happened when the bus halted at Kondapattipirivu for passengers to board.

The lorry driver lost control over his vehicle and hit the bus at the rear, the police sources said.

The Gudimangalam police are investigating.
title: Nine injured as lorry rams bus
